game.name: Wong
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Wong is a 2D platformer designed for speedrunning, where you will clear levels, learn their shortcuts, and compete for the best score in a fluid, precise, and perfection-focused gameplay experience.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Wong is a 2D platformer designed for speedrunning, where you will clear levels, learn their shortcuts, and compete for the best score in a fluid, precise, and perfection-focused gameplay experience.
